fields.title: Careers 🤓
fields.sub_title: On the lookout for smart people who like to learn and make things.
fields.body:
Product Designer

We're on the hunt for a Product Designer who can take ideas from wireframes to finished mobile and desktop app designs. As a Product Designer, you'll work alongside a UX Designer and a Product Manager, to turn user stories into lovely visual interfaces. Your main jam is interface design, but you love to make icons, branding concepts, and do some illustrations too.

Your tool du jour is Sketch, but maybe you're also playing with Figma, and you likely still lean on trusty ol' Illustrator for some vectors. You're used to sharing work in Invision, gathering feedback, and iterating over a design to really nail it. You have experience with design systems (or are curious about them), and you have a portfolio of work ready to share.


About Input Logic

We launch beautifully crafted apps and interfaces for brands and startups. As a small team, we hand-pick our clients and prefer to work with startups, or brands who think like startups (move fast and make things). We love coffee, board games, and spending time outside on our Vancouver Island playground.


Additional

Full time, on-site and/or remote, from our office in Nanaimo, BC.

To apply, email us a link to your portfolio and we will consider it lovingly.


Apply Now

fields.title: Goose — July 2018
fields.headline: Travel insurance made easy
fields.intro_body: Focused on delivering a smart, mobile insurance product Goose asked the Input team to design and develop a mobile iOS and Android app. Our goal was to launch a delightful product that solves real world pain points.

fields.title: 02 — Location based notifications
fields.body: Approaching a border, arriving at an airport or a different county will trigger a notification reminding travellers to purchase an insurance policy.

fields.title: 03 — Streamlined questionnaire
fields.body: Insurance can be complicated and confusing. The Goose app presents a simple step by step process that makes getting the specific insurance you need efficiently.
